title: rec for similar discography/style as IVE
author: kbee94
postText:
their songs are so editorial-fashion-classy-runway vibes and i need more lol if you guys have any song/album/artist recs similar to ive's:

* blue blood
* heroine
* hypnosis
* "classic" is such a great song that went completely under my radar wtf
* my satisfaction (less elegant and more intense but still similar vibes)
* love dive and eleven obv

it's like a more modern Girls Generation japan album (you-aholic, karma butterfly, and the great escape were my JAM back then man, and it's my favorite SNSD sound)

i don't know what to call the genre but it makes me feel really classy and rich listening to these songs lol

comments.comment:
Some deep house influences in most of those songs

[Shh](https://youtu.be/KN030ZVdMWY)-After School

[Love Foolish](https://youtu.be/PeFXRIJXYZo)-Twice

[Stay Tonight](https://youtu.be/YPFIh0dfYfw)-Chungha

[Sunset](https://youtu.be/jvimpjCbR-w)-KNK
comments.author: NeMeies2

comments.comment: Try 'Drip' and 'Replay' by Oh My Girl!

replies.comment: OMG also has a song called [Vogue](https://youtu.be/ofpkzhRzDBs)

comments.comment: weki meki - cool and who am i
comments.author: jourdannthemusician

comments.comment:
A bit of variation sonically, but all these songs give me "expensive" and "classy" vibes

* Who am I - Weki Meki
* Show - CLC
* Lavish Light - ALICE
* Love Foolish - Twice (along with the entire Feel Special mini)
* The Boots - gugudan
* Higher - Fifty Fifty
comments.author: JoggyFroggy
